content.description: A cruiser, juggy arete climb. To the far right of the face (far right of Nest and Eagles) find the arete corner with juggy holds. Sit start on the lowest ledge and work up past larger and smaller juggy and flat features. Top out with edges and good holds.
content.location: To the far right of the face (far right of Nest and Eagles) find the arete corner with juggy holds.

content.description: Start as per The Nest but off the ledge "mouth" trend left and up through the notch to top out.
content.location: Start as per The Nest but off the ledge "mouth" trend left

content.description:
One heck of a one-move-wonder.

 Look to the right of "The Nest" for the tree growing beside and onto the boulder itself. To the right of this tree, directly beside it, find the low, flat edge to sit start at.

 Match the small hold with a full left hand and one or two fingers with your right. Make a hard move up to another flat hold and follow better hold options directly up. Navigate the dirty holds higher (cleaning them would be nice) for the top out.
content.location: Look to the right of "The Nest" for the tree growing beside and onto the boulder itself. To the right of this tree, directly beside it, find the low, flat edge to sit start at.

content.description:
To the far left of the boulder, close to the tree at the far left of the face and to the left of "Left the Nest" look for the low rail.

 Â Start standing low on the rail, matched. Move up and right to the large right facing feature. From there, top out direct.
content.location: To the far left of the boulder, close to the tree at the far left of the face and to the left of "Left the Nest" look for the low rail.

content.description: Lots of fun.  Sit start at the lower left corner of the boulder in the prominent "mouth" matched on the ledge (be careful not to disturb the bird nest if there is one). Toss up and right, working up the face past good holds to the upper slopey lip. Negotiate slopers and find the high pocket side-pull to help with the mantle.
content.location: Sit start at the lower left corner of the boulder in the prominent "mouth" matched on the ledge

content.description: The shorter trail side neighbor to the Gift Boulder. As you walk past Hemingway and Collective Boulders, this is the next boulder on the right.
